legacies.label: Hospital Cybersec Admin
legacies.description: As the systems-admin of a bustling hospital, you are tasked with managing both the medical and digital well-being of the institution. Your choices will shape the future of healthcare in this facility.
legacies.startdescription: Your first day at the hospital dawns with a myriad of challenges. Secure the hospital's data, manage medical resources, and navigate the intricacies of healthcare bureaucracy.
